ingredients.ingredient: 4 russet potatoes, peeled and halved lengthwise
3 (14.5 ounce) cans cut green beans, drained

cookingTips: Cottage ham is partially cooked - shorter cooking time than whole ham
Save cooking liquid for flavoring vegetables
enrichment.coachingPrompt: One-pot meals require timing coordination. How do you ensure potatoes and ham finish cooking simultaneously?
